name: Follow The Sky
description:
Contributors:

Programming: https://honorius.itch.io/ , https://allenw723.itch.io/ , https://momopey.itch.io/ , https://gregoryweber.itch.io/

Art: https://momopey.itch.io/

Developed in 3 days for the VGDC Winter Game Jam 2023.

How to Play
  • Avoid the obstacles by using the mouse to move the astronaut up and down.
  • There are two powerups that can be picked up with your cursor/pet: a health pickup which increases the amount of hearts you have, and a nuke which will destroy all the obstacles on screen.
Attributes
  • Music track 1: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/war-game-commission/track-1/
